topic.title: Mirkwood
topic.shortdesc: Gandalf leaves the company on urgent business as they enter the dark forest of Mirkwood.

section.title: Entering Mirkwood
section.p: After the company leaves the Misty Mountains, they come to the forest of Mirkwood. Gandalf has to go for other important business, leaving Bilbo and the thirteen dwarves to traverse the forest alone. There is a single path through the forest, which Gandalf warns them not to stray from, or else they will never find it again.

section.title: Spiders of Mirkwood
section.p: As they follow the path, something is not right. Suddenly, the company is caught in enormous spiderwebs. Bilbo puts on his ring just as the spiders appear and wonder about how they should eat the dwarves. Using his sword, he fights off the giant spiders. He decides to name his sword Sting because that is what the spiders call it.
